description: This script defines an agent for processing meeting recordings, including downloading audio, transcribing, summarizing, visualizing, and generating an audio summary. It uses specific tools and models from the 'agno' package and is tailored for a meeting summarization and visualization task.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that orchestrates tools and models to perform complex tasks.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class representing the Gemini Google model used for processing.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt to perform the meeting processing workflow.
